death.attack.anvil: %1$s met their fate beneath the falling anvil, bones ground to dust as the world sang their dirge.
death.attack.anvil.player: %1$s, locked in a desperate clash with %2$s, was shattered beneath the iron weight of destiny.
death.attack.arrow: An arrow loosed by %2$s found its mark, and %1$s's cry faded into the mournful wind.
death.attack.arrow.item: %1$s was unmade as %2$s's %3$s struck true, their soul scattered like stardust across the void.
death.attack.badRespawnPoint.message: Fate’s hand was merciless; %1$s was struck down by %2$s, undone by destiny’s cruel jest.
death.attack.cactus: Merciless thorns tore into %1$s's flesh, their pain carried away on the barren wind.
death.attack.cactus.player: %1$s, fleeing %2$s, fell to the waiting embrace of the desert’s cruel thorns.
death.attack.cramming: An unseen force bore down on %1$s, crushing flesh and bone into the void of nothingness.
death.attack.cramming.player: %1$s was driven into oblivion, pressed to ruin by the relentless hand of %2$s.
death.attack.crop_punishment: %1$s was drained of blood by the vengeful crops, crimson rivers sinking into the earth as ballads of sorrow echo in the fields.
death.attack.crop_punishment.player: In strife with %2$s, %1$s fell to the curse of crops, their lifeblood reaped like harvest, sung in whispers by the grieving soil.
death.attack.dragonBreath: The dragon’s breath consumed %1$s, their screams turning to ash and smoke upon the burning winds.
death.attack.dragonBreath.player: %1$s was engulfed in the blazing breath of %2$s, their very soul burned to cinders.
death.attack.drown: %1$s slipped beneath the abyss, their breath stilled and their story silenced in the cold, dark depths.
death.attack.drown.player: %1$s, fleeing the wrath of %2$s, was claimed by the eternal silence beneath the waters.
death.attack.dryout: Under the merciless sun, %1$s withered in the barren wastes, their blood turned to sand, their tale to dust.
death.attack.dryout.player: The desert took its price; fleeing %2$s, %1$s's soul dried and vanished upon the scorched winds.
death.attack.ender_eye_shatter: %1$s was consumed by the shattering of an Eye of Ender, their essence torn apart by the dimensional rift's chaotic energy.
death.attack.ender_eye_shatter.player: %1$s, locked in battle with %2$s, was obliterated by the Eye of Ender's explosive demise, their soul scattered across the void.
death.attack.even_more_magic: Unfathomable sorcery tore through %1$s, erasing their essence, leaving not even whispers behind.
death.attack.explosion: A thunderous blaze unmade %1$s, their remains scattered across the doomed winds of ruin.
death.attack.explosion.player: %1$s was broken in the tempest of %2$s’s fury, their body cast to the four corners of oblivion.
death.attack.explosion.player.item: %1$s was torn asunder by %2$s’s %3$s, their soul hurled screaming into the void.
death.attack.fall: %1$s was cast down from the lofty heavens, their body shattered upon the unforgiving earth.
death.attack.fall.player: %1$s, fleeing the wrath of %2$s, was cast down into ruin, their bones crushed beneath the weight of fate itself.
death.attack.fallingBlock: Lo, the earth descended upon %1$s, and their mortal shell was ground into a ruin most forlorn.
death.attack.fallingBlock.player: In their clash with %2$s, %1$s was mercilessly crushed, the falling earth sealing their doom.
death.attack.fallingStalactite: %1$s was struck by the fang of stone from above, their blood spilling like a crimson tide into the void.
death.attack.fallingStalactite.player: Locked in battle with %2$s, %1$s met their end, impaled by the falling fang of stone.
death.attack.fireball: %1$s was smote by %2$s’s blazing orb, their soul scattered as ashen cinders across the howling wind.
death.attack.fireball.item: %1$s was engulfed by a fireball conjured by %2$s through %3$s, their mortal coil undone in the inferno.
death.attack.fireworks: %1$s was torn asunder in a thunderous roar, their light snuffed out with the dying blast.
death.attack.fireworks.item: %1$s was obliterated by fireworks ignited by %2$s with %3$s, their essence vanishing with the final sparks.

death.attack.flyIntoWall: %1$s was undone by an unseen force, their body shattered by the sheer fury of speed.

death.attack.freeze: %1$s was bound in the eternal frost, their life stilled and encased in the tomb of ice.

death.attack.generic: The cold hand of fate reached for %1$s, and their final breath drifted into the silence of eternity.

death.attack.inWall: %1$s was pressed into a suffocating silence by the unfeeling stone, perishing in the grasp of darkness.

death.attack.magic: %1$s was consumed by the maelstrom of arcane chaos, their essence torn apart and cast into the void.
death.attack.magic.player: While fleeing %2$s, %1$s was wholly devoured by unbridled magic, their existence erased.
death.attack.mob: %1$s fell in the bloody clash of steel and fury, their life ended by the wrath of %2$s.

death.attack.player: %1$s was struck down by %2$s, their story erased from the river of destiny.

death.attack.sonic_boom: %1$s was shattered by a screaming wave, their soul dissolving into echoes that faded into silence.

death.attack.sun_gaze: %1$s was scorched by the sun's piercing gaze, their soul consumed by radiant flames, reduced to ethereal ashes.
